name: Project Report
query:
select project_name_task as "Project Name", (select count(*) from `tabTask` as T2 
                                            where stage='Reviewed'
                                            and T2.project_name_task=T1.project_name_task 
                                            group by project_name_task) / count(*) * 100 as "Progress (In Percent)",
(select group_concat(task_name SEPARATOR ', ') from `tabTask` as T3 
            where T3.project_name_task=T1.project_name_task and T3.stage!='Reviewed') as 'Tasks Remaining',

(select group_concat(task_name SEPARATOR ', ') from `tabTask` as T4
            where T4.project_name_task=T1.project_name_task and T4.stage='Reviewed') as 'Tasks Completed'

from `tabTask` as T1
group by project_name_task
